predicate.note: Frames file for 'freak' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, since it's hardly a verb.

example.name: adjectival!
example.text: We are all fine here, although Mame was extremely freaked.

example.name: creepy
example.text: Mary's imitation of a kind, gentle, loving wife freaked John out.
example.arg: Mary's imitation of a kind, gentle, loving wife
